# Introduction

Hello! My name is **Lin Xiang Hong**, and I am currently a student at the **Singapore Institute of Technology**, pursuing a degree in **Applied Artificial Intelligence**.

## Education

I am dedicated to mastering the complexities of artificial intelligence to leverage its capabilities in solving real-world problems. My academic journey focuses on both the theoretical and practical aspects of AI, ensuring a robust and versatile understanding of this dynamic field.

## Hobbies

When I am not engrossed in my studies, I enjoy cycling. Cycling not only keeps me physically fit but also provides a refreshing break from the mental demands of my studies, allowing me to return to my work with a clear and focused mind.

As I continue my academic career, I aim to develop innovative AI solutions that are both effective and ethical. I look forward to contributing to advancements in technology that can benefit society as a whole.

Thank you for taking the time to learn about me. I am excited about the opportunities and challenges that lie ahead in my field of study.
